title: Sauerkraut: Germany's Probiotic Powerhouse
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Sauerkraut: Germany's Probiotic Powerhouse.

hook.text: Sauerkraut is just cabbage and salt. No vinegar, no cooking. Bacteria do everything else.

buildup.text: Salt draws water from cabbage via osmosis, creating a brine. Lactobacillus bacteria begin converting sugars to acid.

climax.text: Unpasteurized sauerkraut contains more probiotics per serving than most commercial supplements.

punchline.text: Two ingredients. Zero cooking. Maximum nutrition.
